PowerMeter

Contains logic for interacting with the laser power meter

Functions
GetReading
call PowerMeter.GetReading(
&reading
);

Returns the current reading on the Power Meter

Response Parameters
&reading

the current reading

Zero
call PowerMeter.Zero();

Zero the Power Meter

Extend
call PowerMeter.Extend();

Extend the Power Meter into the measurement position

Retract
call PowerMeter.Retract();

Retract the Power Meter to the home position
